𓉐 𓂠 𓏏 𓉐 / 𓉐 𓂋 𓂻 𐀟 pe
𒁀𒁍 ba-bu door, gate @ Babel
𓂘 𓃀

Very old full reading of 𓇋 𓇋 fur < φέρε as in 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓂠 󴤬 φέρετρον phéretron bier Bahre Very old full reading of 𓇋 𓇋 fur < φέρε as in 𓉔 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓇯 portal

𒁍𒊑 bu-ri φορβή phorbḗ фура́ж furáž forage porthiant 𒁍𒊑 buᵗri fodder

𒌑𒆦𒋰𒄭𒊒 u2-paḥ-hi-ru packer "gather" (𒈜 le'paḥ <> (wolf…)pack) 𓉐 𓂋 𓂻 port

ᶠaddir [FORD] 𒀀𒉺𒄐𒉻𒋛𒀀; ᶠaddir ford < port 𒉺𒄐!
